title: Config API to switch on/off lucene's logging infoStream
description:
To enable infoStream logging into solr, you need to edit solrconfig.xml and reload core;

We intend to introduce config api to enable/disable infostream logging in near future.

comments.content: This patch works when infoStream is at least mentioned in the solrconfig.xml, disabled / enabled. Looking into how we can add; probably need update- create- plugins.
comments.author: Amrit Sarkar
